name: Multi-goal tilt mazes
description:
Tilt-based logic mazes which are so much harder than they look. Can you successfully collect all the blue targets without getting stuck?

  • Number of puzzles: 12 
  • Average play time: 50 mins 
  • First published: 1999 (itch.io relaunch: April 2021)
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to tilt; [Z] to undo ; [R] for restart. 
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to tilt; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.

For more tilt maze variations visit: http://www.clickmazes.com/new-indext.htm
